briefdescription.para: This validator checks a UCI.indication message.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the RNTI property of the UCI PUSCH PDU, UCI PUCCH format 0/1/2/3/4 PDU as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.1 to 3.9.4.3.
Validates the timing advance offset property of the UCI PUSCH PDU, UCI PUCCH format 0/1/2/3/4 PDU as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.1 to 3.9.4.3.
Validates the timing advance offset in nanoseconds property of the UCI PUSCH PDU, UCI PUCCH format 0/1/2/3/4 PDU as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.1 to 3.9.4.3.
Validates the RSSI property of the UCI PUSCH PDU, UCI PUCCH format 0/1/2/3/4 PDU as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.1 to 3.9.4.3.
Validates the RSRP property of the UCI PUSCH PDU, UCI PUCCH format 0/1/2/3/4 PDU as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.1 to 3.9.4.3.
Validates the HARQ detection status property of the HARQ PDU for format 2/3/4 or for PUSCH, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the expected HARQ bit length detection status property of the HARQ PDU for format 2, 3 or 4 or for PUSCH, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.

briefdescription.para: Validates the CSI part 1 detection status property of the CSI part 1 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the expected CSI part 1 bit length detection status property of the CSI part 1 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.

briefdescription.para: Validates the CSI part 2 detection status property of the CSI part 2 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the expected CSI part 2 bit length detection status property of the CSI part 2 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.

briefdescription.para: Validates the PUCCH format property of the PUCCH format 0/1 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.2.
Validates the SR indication property of the SR PDU for format 0/1, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the SR confidence level property of the SR PDU for format 0 or 1, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the HARQ confidence level property of the HARQ PDU for format 0/1, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the number of HARQ bits property of the HARQ PDU for format 0/1, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the HARQ value property of the HARQ PDU for format 0/1, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the PUCCH format property of the PUCCH format 2/3/4 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.3.
Validates the SR bit length property of the SR format 2/3/4 PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the UCI detection status property of the UCI payload for PUSCH or PUCCH, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
Validates the expected UCI payload size property of the UCI payload for PUSCH or PUCCH, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.9.4.
